title: Looking to take new/lower ranked players under my wing!
body: Hello my name is Saffice, I am a plat 3 player on NA and peaked at plat 1 75 lp. I play mostly adc and jungle but I am proficient in all roles. When I first started playing a had a friend show me the ropes and help me improve. Now that I have achieved a reasonable high ranking I would like to do the same(completely free of course, no interest in profit). I would be willing to do everything from replay reviews to actually playing with you. I feel that "higher teir" players should help and look out for newer and/ lower ranked players and help them improve even if its just with small tips! If anyone would be interested in this comment below! I have a discord also dedicated to this!

replies.body: Hey man not new to league but am still a lower rank currently at Silver IV.  If you don't mind I would love some pointers or tips.

Hey bud, im low silver and i have been playing league for quite a long time.
Maybe we could duo or you could review a game of mine and give me some tips. 
Been trying to climb since the beginning my friend, 8+ years and im still stuck here.
Top/Jungle main. Add me or reply on here if anyone would like to help me out.

> [{quoted}](name=Yarr Im a Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=8VGeE7cQ,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-01T21:16:27.570+0000)
>
> Hey bud, im low silver and i have been playing league for quite a long time.
> Maybe we could duo or you could review a game of mine and give me some tips. 
> Been trying to climb since the beginning my friend, 8+ years and im still stuck here.
> Top/Jungle main. Add me or reply on here if anyone would like to help me out.

I would love to help you out!

> [{quoted}](name=Saffice,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=8VGeE7cQ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-12-01T21:29:56.434+0000)
>
> I would love to help you out!

I just sent you a request

I'd be very appreciate of anything you can do to help me boost my league performance. I can do any lane and any role. But I like to mid>adc>top. First started actually playing more then 10 games in ranked and went from bronze 4 to silver 1. Also just went in flex from bronze 5 - Silver 5 in approx 26hours. Would love your help. Ign- Ftwlegend
Gold 5 jungler, I want to be a better jungle and have been struggling with doing so, ign : Its Ogre id love to hear what you have to say man

Would love any advice or tips. I'm super relaxed and willing to be criticized.
ign: Witz (silver 1)

Most higher tier players are more interested in making smurf accounts to punish lower tier players.  That's why I never bothered to try ranked to begin with.  I get my ass kicked enough in blinds and drafts by admitted smurfs to not even want to jump into the toxic pool.  The fact that I'm a Support Main and I'm dependent on everyone else doesn't help.

> [{quoted}](name=RAMP Schmidtty,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=8VGeE7cQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-01T18:58:19.984+0000)
